data.actual_result: Pressing enter does nothing and this gets spammed in console http://i.imgur.com/pLWdo7G.png
data.expected_result: Message sends successfully and the command works.
data.short_description: /commands (like /me and /shrug) don't work in private messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a group DM or private message - Try to use a /command (excluding stuff like /giphy)
